name: Sacred Chain
description:
Controls: 

WASD  to move

Mouse click on screen to launch the chain

Save the Florbos by returning the sun to the sky and defeating the monster that stole it. Collect Sacred Chain links and forge the sacred chain. Beware, taking damage and missing the monster after you start your fight will break your chain!

This is my first game jam game. All assets in this game were made in48 hours during the Jame Gam #9 game jam.
